item.title: Skill Mismatch with Worker-side Learning Heterogeneity
item.description: Do interpersonal and cognitive skills adjust to skill mismatch? Recent papers have looked into the different characteristics of mismatchin skills. For example, Lise and Postel-Vinay (2020) find that cogni-tive skills adjust slowly and interpersonal skills are fixed over a life-time. However, they and most of the literature simulate the on-the-joblearning process. So, this paper revisits these results using NaturalLanguage Processing to incorporate unique data on the heterogeneityof learning within the same occupation. I find that interpersonal skillsdo adjust to skill mismatch, albeit slowly.
